foreignData.name: Kookus
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn Du während Deiner Versorgungsphase nicht mindestens einen Hüter von Kookus kontrollierst, fügt Dir Kookus 3 Schadenspunkte zu und greift in diesem Zug an, wenn möglich.
{R}: +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Kookus
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
During your upkeep, if you do not control at least one Keeper of Kookus, Kookus deals 3 damage to you and attacks this turn if able.
oo
R +1/+0 until end of turn.
mainBoard.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Keeper of Kookus, Kookus deals 3 damage to you and attacks this turn if able.
{R}: Kookus gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Ate up all of his siblings in the first week. A good beginning for one destined to command."
—Suka, ogre matron

foreignData.name: Oger-Vollstrecker
foreignData.text: Der Oger-Vollstrecker kann nicht zerstört werden, wenn er tödlichen Schaden erhält, es sei denn, eine einzelne Schadensquelle fügt ihm genügend Schadenspunkte zu, um ihn zu zerstören.

mainBoard.name: Ogre Enforcer
mainBoard.originalText: Ogre Enforcer cannot be destroyed by lethal damage unless a single source deals enough damage to destroy it.

rulings.text: If its toughness falls to zero or less and it is undamaged, it will still be put into the graveyard.
The check for nonlethal damage is done on a per-source basis. So each source’s damage is checked independently and it is not possible to team up sources (such as creatures) in order to kill it.

mainBoard.text: Ogre Enforcer can't be destroyed by lethal damage unless lethal damage dealt by a single source is marked on it.

foreignData.name: Goblin-Anwerber
foreignData.text:
Wenn der Goblin-Anwerber ins Spiel kommt, durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer beliebigen Anzahl von Goblinkarten.
Zeige diese Karten allen Spielern. Mische deine Bibliothek danach neu und lege die gezeigten Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben auf Deine Bibliothek.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Recruiter
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Recruiter comes into play, search your library for any number of Goblin cards. Reveal those cards to all players. Shuffle your library, then put the cards on top of your library in any order.

rulings.text: You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including creature or kindred cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

mainBoard.text: When Goblin Recruiter enters, search your library for any number of Goblin cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I see a great victory and rivers of blood. And . . . hmm, looks like a spleen."
—Grishnak, goblin soothsayer

rulings.text: It is returned to its owner’s hand at the end of any turn in which it is on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Swine-Rider

foreignData.name: Macht der Massen
foreignData.text:
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält Trampeln.
Wenn alle Nicht-Mauerkreaturen, die Du kontrollierst, angreifen, erhält die verzauberte Kreatur +*/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges, wobei * gleich der Anzahl an angreifenden Kreaturen ist.

mainBoard.name: Mob Mentality
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchanted creature gains trample.
If all non-Wall creatures you control attack, enchanted creature gets +*/+0 until end of turn, where * is equal to the number of attacking creatures.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample.
Whenever all non-Wall creatures you control attack, enchanted creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

foreignData.name: Goblinspäher
foreignData.text: Bringe drei Goblinspäher- Spielsteine ins Spiel. Behandle diese Spielsteine wie 1/1 rote Kreaturen mit Gebirgstarnung, die als Goblins zählen.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Scouts
mainBoard.originalText: Put three Goblin Scout tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures with mountainwalk that count as Goblins (if defending player controls any mountains, these creatures are unblockable).

rulings.text: The tokens are of creature type Goblin and Scout. They are affected by things that affect Goblins.
The tokens have ‘Mountainwalk’ in their text, and will be affected by text-changing effects accordingly.

mainBoard.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin Scout creature tokens with mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

mainBoard.name: Fireblast

foreignData.name: Lied des Blutes

mainBoard.name: Song of Blood
mainBoard.originalText: Put the top four cards from your library into your graveyard. For each creature card put into your graveyard in this way, all creatures that attack this turn get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If a creature attacks more than once in a turn, it gets the bonus each time.

mainBoard.text: Mill four cards. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.
